searchSql.baseSql:
select * from ( SELECT ART.ID_ AS taskID, ART.CREATE_TIME_ CREATE_TIME, ART.NAME_ AS taskName, ART.TASK_DEF_KEY_ AS taskCode, ART.PROC_INST_ID_ AS INST_CODE, ART.DELEGATION_ AS DELEGATION, tw.CASE_CODE, tw.BUSINESS_KEY, (select Count(PKID) from sctrans.T_TO_MODULE_SUBSCRIBE ttms where ttms.SUBSCRIBER_ID=:sessionUserId and ttms.MODULE_CODE=tw.CASE_CODE ) as SUBSCRIBE_COUNT ,(select PROPERTY_CODE from sctrans.T_TO_PROPERTY_INFO where CASE_CODE=tw.CASE_CODE) propertyCode ,(select CASE_ORIGIN from sctrans.T_TO_CASE where CASE_CODE=tw.CASE_CODE) CASE_ORIGIN
FROM sctrans.ACT_RU_TASK ART INNER JOIN sctrans.T_TO_WORKFLOW AS tw ON ART.PROC_INST_ID_ =tw.INST_CODE WHERE ART.ASSIGNEE_ = #userLoginName# AND ART.SUSPENSION_STATE_ = '1' and exists (Select 1 from sctrans.T_TO_CASE_INFO where CASE_CODE=tw.CASE_CODE) <ifNotNull allType> AND ART.DELEGATION_ IS NULL </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull guestname> AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM sctrans.T_TG_GUEST_INFO WHERE CASE_CODE = tw.CASE_CODE and GUEST_NAME LIKE '%'+#guestname#+'%' ) </ifNotNull> ) as AB where 1=1 <when test ="isSubscribeFilter==0"> and AB.SUBSCRIBE_COUNT>0 </when> <when test ="isSubscribeFilter==1"> and AB.SUBSCRIBE_COUNT=0 </when> <ifNotNull propertyAddr> AND exists (select 1 from sctrans.T_TO_PROPERTY_INFO TP where TP.CASE_CODE=AB.CASE_CODE AND TP.PROPERTY_ADDR like '%'+#propertyAddr#+'%') </ifNotNull>
<ifNotNull agentName> AND exists (Select 1 from sctrans.T_TO_CASE_INFO where CASE_CODE=AB.CASE_CODE and AGENT_NAME like '%'+#agentName#+'%') </ifNotNull>
<ifNotNull agentName> AND exists (Select 1 from sctrans.T_TO_CASE_INFO where CASE_CODE=AB.CASE_CODE and AGENT_NAME like '%'+#agentName#+'%') </ifNotNull>
<ifNotNull agentOrgName> AND exists (Select 1 from sctrans.T_TO_CASE_INFO where CASE_CODE=AB.CASE_CODE and GRP_NAME like '%'+#agentOrgName#+'%') </ifNotNull>
<ifNotNull ctmCode> AND exists (Select 1 from sctrans.T_TO_CASE_INFO where CASE_CODE=AB.CASE_CODE and CTM_CODE like '%'+#ctmCode#+'%') </ifNotNull> <if test="minDateLamp!=null or maxDateLamp!=null " > <if test="minDateLamp!='' or maxDateLamp!='' " > AND exists ( select 1 from sctrans.T_TO_TRANS_PLAN t_to_trans_plan where t_to_trans_plan.CASE_CODE =AB.CASE_CODE and t_to_trans_plan.PART_CODE=AB.taskCode <ifNotNull minDateLamp> and DATEDIFF(DAY, t_to_trans_plan.EST_PART_TIME, GETDATE())> #minDateLamp# </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull maxDateLamp> and DATEDIFF(DAY, t_to_trans_plan.EST_PART_TIME, GETDATE()) < #maxDateLamp# </ifNotNull>
) </if> </if>

column.name: RED_LOCK,EST_PART_TIME,DATELAMP
column.display: 红灯记录,预计执行时间,红绿灯
